section.name: Overview
section.p: The community software provides a means to register IVO users, and to provide them with credentials so that they can access restricted resources. The community is supplied as a web application that provides a number of services.

dl.dd: a RESTful web-service that dispenses credentials and reveals the URL for a user's home space in VOSpace.
a SOAP service which reports to the client the IVORN for the user's home space.

This is service is deprecated, its role being taken over by the accounts service. Clients using this service should switch to the accounts service immediately, as the policy manager will be removed in later releases.
a classical web-browser interface for the community operators.

section.p: The community contains a local certificate authority, operated by the community managers through the community's administration interface.
